name: Salt Bug
description:
In this game you are only a small creature but if you will climb over the metal sticking into the sky then you have proven your right to a place among the cosmos as a living Bango on the pulsating earth like a tick that is drinking blood greedily!

since you are a primordial creature that came out of the salt, you can not simply walk around. You must press up to jump, and down to drop down, and then use the arrow keys to guide yourself while in the air.

oh yeah also you can stick to walls and roofs too, not just the floor

This game is proudly brought to you by itch.io and the Australian Government.
